name: BetterPlayInitiative
fullText:
The “turf wars” are in full swing, as The Washington Post recently covered. However, The Post discussed crumb rubber infill as though the science is uncertain, without mentioning this year’s joint study by CalEPA and OEHHA.

The CalEPA conducted a risk assessment of turf fields https://t.co/8Wup9scITr

name: Devin Baker
fullText:

Dreamy regulation, tepid macro, but strong outlook intact
